description: The Tree of Life is a universal symbol of the interconnectedness and evolution of life, found in many spiritual traditions. In Kabbalah, the Tree of Life forms the structure on which the Sephirot are mapped out. The Yggdrasil tree illustrates the nine worlds of the Norse cosmology.
